name: Beach Gas Gas
description:
Beach Gas Gas is a high-speed driving game that is all about adrenaline and excitement.

Set on a street near the beach, the game allows players to experience the thrill of aggressive driving as they race down the road, dodging obstacles and collecting points. The game features two different modes of play - players can choose to drive their car in one direction or go head-to-head with oncoming traffic in the opposite direction. Each mode presents unique challenges and obstacles, and players must use their driving skills to navigate through traffic and avoid collisions.

The objective of the game is to drive as far as possible without crashing or running out of fuel. As players drive past the crowds, they can perform stunts and dangerous maneuvers to earn extra points and show off their driving skills.
With its addictive gameplay and endless replayability, Beach Gas Gas is sure to be a hit with anyone who loves high-speed driving games and the rush of adrenaline that comes with them.

Game Features :
- 6 different cars in garage
- 2 Modes ( One way / Two way)
- Sunny/Night run
